author: nflaig
content:
Curious if others are interested in pre-releases of the beacon api spec, it would help us run spec tests against new electra attestation v2 apis and could be generally useful for other new / unreleased apis.

https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/463

author: nc1234
content: If we decide to do pre-release, will we have a fixed schedule (eg. for each new devnet, for each consensus specs pre-release) or we just pre-release irregularly?

author: nflaig
content: I would do it based on number of changes done to master, and then could decide if it's worth it to cut a pre-release or not, generally speaking, it's really cheap process (just pushing a tag). Also api changes might be unrelated to devnets or spec updates, so I would tend to do pre-release irregularly
